name: Front Park and The Clump Walk, Killerton

ai.summary: An easy 3.8 km circular hike at Killerton Estate in the UK, linking Front Park with The Clump Walk. Suitable for families and casual walkers, it traverses open parkland, woodland and a gentle ascent to The Clump offering views over the surrounding countryside.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly gravel and packed earth paths with a few grassy slopes. Expect flat to gently rolling sections, occasional uneven ground near woodlands, and a short ascent to The Clump. Ground can be muddy after rain and in winter.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and stay on marked paths. Be prepared for weather changes; bring a waterproof layer, water and a snack. Carry a map or GPS and keep your phone charged. Watch for other walkers, livestock or road crossings near estate boundaries, and supervise children. If you have mobility concerns, consider an easier alternative.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing suitable for the season
Map or GPS device / offline map
Phone charged and emergency contact info
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to November) are ideal for dry, comfortable walking; the route is accessible year-round but can be muddy and slippery in winter.

seo.title: Front Park and The Clump Walk, Killerton – Easy 3.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 3.8 km hike at Killerton Estate: Front Park and The Clump Walk with open parkland, woodland, and a gentle climb to The Clump.
